"Battery-powered dental care on-the-go": A portable electric toothbrush that can be charged via USB or a portable battery pack, making it ideal for travelers and outdoor enthusiasts who may not have access to a power outlet.

"Smart toothbrush with customizable brushing modes": An electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes that can be customized to suit individual needs, such as sensitive teeth, gum care, or deep cleaning.
"Toothbrush with built-in tongue cleaner": An electric toothbrush with a built-in tongue cleaner to help remove bacteria and freshen breath.
"Electric toothbrush with integrated timer and pressure sensor": An electric toothbrush with a built-in timer and pressure sensor to ensure proper brushing technique and duration.
